org.apache.ignite.spi.deployment.uri.scanners

Interface GridUriDeploymentScannerListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface GridUriDeploymentScannerListener
extends EventListener
    Scanner listener interface. Whatever deployment scanner is used (http, file and so on) following events happens:
    • onNewOrUpdatedFile - happens when new file has been found or updated.
    • onDeletedFiles - happens when file(s) has been removed.
    • onFirstScanFinished - happens when scanner completed its first scan.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeletedFiles(List<String> uris)
      Notifies about removed files.
      void onFirstScanFinished()
      Notifies about first scan completion.
      void onNewOrUpdatedFile(File file, String uri, long tstamp)
      Notifies about new file or those one that was updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onNewOrUpdatedFile

        void onNewOrUpdatedFile(File file,
                        String uri,
                        long tstamp)
        Notifies about new file or those one that was updated.
        Parameters:
        file - New or updated file.
        uri - File URI.
        tstamp - File modification date.

        Notifies about removed files.
